Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !drag
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !drag [character]
EXAMPLE: !drag Retribution
The drag command lets you restrain a character so they can't leave their current room, then brings then along with you when you walk away. In order to stop dragging someone, instead "!drag nobody" or drag a different person. (You can only drag one person a time.)
Dragging someone off to a private place to talk is the primary use of this command, through the !grab command is probably less intrusive to the roleplaying of other characters.
SEE ALSO: !grab, !ungrab
